title: White House Social Media Data Visualization
description: In this Coding Challenge, I discuss how to use the newly released White House social media data to make simple data visualization example with p5.js.

codeExamples.title: Obamathon Word Count by Date Example
codeExamples.description: This sketch highlights the words used in the tweets from the White House with a bar chart.

links.title: The White House Social Media Data
links.description: White House announcement accompanying the release of social media data.
